text: Angel Witch are a British heavy metal band. They gained popularity during the NWOBHM due to the release of their first album, the self titled Angel Witch. The album was released in December 1980. The band have split up and reunited many times over the years, first in 1982, then in 1986, 1998, 2003, 2005 and finally in 2008. == Discography == * Angel Witch [1980] * Screamin' And Bleeding [1985] * Frontal Assault [1986] * Resurrection [2000] * As Above So Below [2012] * Angel of Light [2019] == References == Category:British musical groups
title: Angel Witch
